marklogic.body: Ya think so?Â Wait til Massachusetts gets done looking it over.Â It's prohibited to sell laser sights in Mass, yet I took delivery on a Spotting Scope equipped with a laser sight.Â Duh!Â You want a laser sight?Â Just cross a State line in most any direction, except east, of course, (water) buy your new laser sight, and back to Mass we go.Â Â Talk about stupid!Â All the powers that be have accomplished, is to pass legislation that limits the profit a potential retailer could make.Â And that's the bottom line.Â Are the citizens of Mass any safer because of it?Â Now what do YOU think?
